author: plusminushalf
content: Does anyone here have experience with Hardened JS? Repo: https://github.com/endojs/endo/blob/master/packages/ses/README.md

author: plusminushalf
content:
My goal:

I want to enable multiple SCW implementations in the chrome extension that I am making. For this, every SCW implementation will have to write a walletAPI. An example of such wallet API - https://github.com/eth-infinitism/bundler/blob/main/packages/sdk/src/SimpleAccountAPI.ts#L28

Since these implementations can be arbitrary and can be written by anyone, they must run in a safe environment, for this purpose I intend to use SES. I am not sure what is the best way to integrate with this API.

My first thought was to create a Compartment in the background script & then load the wallet API in a compartment in the background script. But currently, since Manifest v3, eval is not available in the background scripts I see this issue - https://github.com/endojs/endo/issues/1380 which states that we cannot have a compartment without unsafe-eval in CSP. 

If someone here can help me with the best design for implementation it would be super helpful.
